explains: n. <文>（长久或辛勤的）寻求，探求；（中世纪传奇故事中骑士的）探险
wordGroup: quest for 追求；探索，设法找到
in quest of 探寻，寻求；为了追求……

sentences.en: His quest for perfection is relentless.
sentences.cn: 他对完美的追求是不懈的。

sentences.en: I have not faltered in my quest for a new future.
sentences.cn: 我对崭新未来的追求未曾犹豫过。

sentences.en: You should not be afraid to aim high in the quest for an improvement in your income.
sentences.cn: 在寻求收入提高方面，你应该敢于给自己设定高的目标。
